page.title: 03LITTLE DEWCHURCH
page.content: Most people have in the village for about 7 years, and they came because it was near their work or because they liked the village and the area. Everybody liked living there, and none of them wanted any changes made, except for one man who said the village hall was in the wrong place and wanted it moved. The village has grown over the last few years, but nobody minded. One woman did say it had grown enough, and if it got any bigger it would turn into a town. Most people go to work by car, some by bike, and one even walks. They all go into Hereford at least once a month, most of them once a week. The usual means of transport is by car. Watching television is the most popular entertainment, though some go into town. Most people would like more to do in the village.
